biotools.summary: The (Zebrafish) Xenograft Phenotype Interactive Repository (Xe.Ph.I.R) is an online database for describing how human cancer behaves when engrafted in zebrafish embryos. We provide representative images of the first days of cancer development post-engraftment and all the metadata required to recapitulate the experiments.

bioschemas.name: XePhIR
